verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*’s \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, Abijah \w became|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. \w His|strong="H1961"\w* mother’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4322"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Uriel; she \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*. \w And|strong="H3389"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w between|strong="H4421"\w* Abijah \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*.

Abijah \w went|strong="H4421"\w* into \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* an \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* 400,000 chosen \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, \w while|strong="H5973"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w drew|strong="H6186"\w* \w up|strong="H6186"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w formation|strong="H6186"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* 800,000 chosen \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w valor|strong="H2428"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* Abijah \w stood|strong="H6965"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zemaraim|strong="H6787"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Ephraim \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*!

\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* kingship \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*?

\w Yet|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* master.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w worthless|strong="H1100"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w wicked|strong="H1100"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w resist|strong="H2388"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w*, \w inexperienced|strong="H7390"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w unable|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w resist|strong="H2388"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* think \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w resist|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w*. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w indeed|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vast|strong="H7227"\w* \w army|strong="H1995"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* gods.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drive|strong="H5080"\w* \w out|strong="H5080"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*? \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* lands? \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w comes|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w consecrate|strong="H4390"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* rams \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* gods.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H5800"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. We \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w Him|strong="H5800"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* attend \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w duties|strong="H4399"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H1242"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H1242"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* present \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fragrant|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w set|strong="H1197"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rows|strong="H4635"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w showbread|strong="H3899"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ceremonially \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H1242"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w light|strong="H5216"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w lampstand|strong="H4501"\w*. \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* carrying \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* requirements \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H2009"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w Himself|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* \w sound|strong="H7321"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w battle|strong="H8643"\w* call \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w succeed|strong="H6743"\w*.”

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* sent troops \w around|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w ambush|strong="H3993"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rear, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3063"\w* \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ambush|strong="H3993"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* behind \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* discovered \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w both|strong="H4421"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* behind \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w blew|strong="H2690"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w raised|strong="H7321"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w battle|strong="H7321"\w* \w cry|strong="H7321"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w raised|strong="H7321"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cry|strong="H7321"\w*, God \w routed|strong="H5062"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Abijah \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5307"\w* Abijah \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w* \w blow|strong="H4347"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 500,000 chosen \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.

Thus \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* prevailed \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w relied|strong="H8172"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers.

Abijah \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H7291"\w*: \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w Jeshanah|strong="H3466"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Ephron|strong="H6085"\w*, along \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w villages|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w But|strong="H2388"\w* Abijah \w grew|strong="H1121"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, \w married|strong="H5375"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* wives, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w became|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty-two|strong="H6242"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.
